title: Quiz - Révision Semaine 1
description: Quiz de révision sur les concepts de base de la semaine 1

questions.question: How do you greet someone formally?
questions.explanation: 'Good morning' is a formal and polite greeting.

questions.question: What's the correct response to 'What's your name?'
questions.explanation: 'My name is...' is the correct way to respond when asked for your name.

questions.question: Which is the most polite way to ask for help?
questions.explanation: 'Could you please help me?' is the most polite and formal way to ask for help.
